entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets early this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Local blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
